## EN578-210714 - Refresh 2 - Guard Services - Alternate Method of Supply

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4263427132-Doc4265400849
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4263427132
* **Publication Date**: October 19, 2023

### Tender Overview
Canada requires the provision of Guard services to locations across the country, excluding areas subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements. This tender invites bids for a Standing Offer and Supply Arrangement to meet this requirement.

### Tender Requirements
The tender includes two major components:
*   Provision of Guard services to locations throughout Canada (excluding areas subject to the Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements)
*   Establishment of a Standing Offer and Supply Arrangement (RFSOSA) to provide these services

### Tender Methodology
This is a competitive tender, with a Request for Bids (RFB) approach. Bidders are expected to submit their bids electronically through Ariba Discovery, with the closing time adjusted to 2:00 p.m. EST on November 21, 2023.

### Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please reach out to:
Cayer, Sophie (SPAC/PSPC) (she/her)
Contact Email: [sophie.cayer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sophie.cayer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Resources
For more information, please refer to the attached notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17758525](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17758525)

### Tender Closing Date
Tenders must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery by 2:00 p.m. EST on November 21, 2023. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive. Please note that the initial closing time announced on Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell has been superseded by this updated date. [1](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17758525)
